column3: Local Foods is (as the name suggests) all about the dine-local experience
column4: and you can totally tell by how rich it all tastes. As a self-professed carnivore
column5: Local Foods is one of the few places that can make me enjoy a salad that much; you can practically feel the freshness in the crisp arugula
column7: and the delicious red peppers. The Panzanella and Arugula are my personal favorites. The crunchy chicken is another great choice
column8: especially with the pretzel bun and ranch dressing.
